summary: A collection of unit tests that verify EC2 Elastic IP address operations—including allocation, association, disassociation, description, filtering, tagging, and release—in both VPC and classic environments, using mocked AWS services.
business_intent: Ensure that the Elastic IP management functionality behaves correctly, handles error conditions, respects filters and tags, and supports both VPC and classic scenarios, providing confidence in the EC2 networking code.
